attributes.action: Free Schools PSHE - Learning about "stable relationships" not "the importance of marriage"
attributes.additional_details: This e-petition calls for references to marriage being removed from The Free School Model Funding Agreement and Academy Model Funding Agreement, July 2011 and all documents that supercede in relation to sex and relationship education.  Instead, there should be a sustained focus on the importance of stable relationships and their importance for family life and bringing up children.
